data.title: GLAD CHRISTMAS TIDINGS (2011)
data.text:
This title comes from a private collection. It is a one-off and will be only available until sold out. So, the first in with an order will get the title, NO REPEATS. This item is a MOD (Manufactured-On-Demand) release (DVD-R). Most titles previously had a pressed release but have lapsed out of print and are now only available on these MOD discs. Discs are coded REGION ALL and can be played worldwide. We endeavour to find the best quality print available at all times. However, depending on the source, some imperfections do occur.

Should you receive a defective item, we will gladly replace it with the same title. We will not consider sending replacements or issuing a refund unless you have communicated the problem to us and received a Return Authority.
